scripts.build: tsc && cp src/style.css docs/ && cp src/translations.json docs/ && cp index.html docs/ && sed -i '' 's|href="src/style.css"|href="style.css"|g' docs/index.html && cp docs/main.js main.js 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.serve: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; cd docs && python3 -m http.server 8000
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
